mapper.update:
update t_admin_log
tail = #{tail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_admin_log set tail = #{tail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select al.id, al.tail, al.alias, al.admin_id, al.remark, al.create_time, a.nick_name,a.phone,a.email from t_admin_log as al left join t_admin_info as a on a.admin_id = al.admin_id WHERE 1=1
and al.admin_id in(select admin_id from t_admin_info where nick_name like '%${adminStr}%' or phone like '%${adminStr}%' or email like '%${adminStr}%' or account like '%${adminStr}%')
and al.create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and #{entTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= al.create_time
order by al.create_time desc
